Text: O O̩jo̩, uwe̩ mʼuwa ko rikpolo rinyo̩, uwe̩ fʼuwa gulo̩ wʼane̩ me̩;
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw ane̩-i miejo, e̩ fʼu ge̩ me̩;
Uwe̩ mʼe̩wñ ki gbiti ko ña amone̩-we̩ me̩;
Uwe̩ mʼagaliga du ñw abo ku ma railo we̩ me̩,
Nʼo̩wo̩-we̩ awo̩to̩ jadu wa, kʼe̩ dohi ñw a,
O̩jo̩ ka ef efo̩-wñ me̩: nagwoye;
Gilead omi ne̩; omi ño̩ ne̩ Manasa ge̩;
E̩ne̩ adʼumi wʼef ewo kʼi nʼaku le̩?
O̩ O̩jo̩, i chʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ ko wa rinyo̩ le̩ ache n?
Lugbo O̩jo̩ oñ a ache e̩wñ ugbiti;
